name: SquidOS
description: SquidOS is a project by Squidman Studios dating back to 2019. In September 2020, the project was remade. There have been 5 versions of the project released since then. On December 7, 2020, a total rewrite of the project was announced and released on February 7, 2021. The latest version is SquidOS Polaris, which is planned to release in January 2022.
